mapper.select:
select distinct c.patientcode from md_report_content c where c.report_type=5
and c.create_time >= #{param.startDate}
and c.create_time <= DATE_ADD(#{param.endDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND exists(select 1 from md_peispatient p where p.patientcode=c.patientcode and p.org_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.orgName},'%') )
order by c.patientcode desc
